rtega_mnemonic:
慶慶RS
庆庆		congratulate, celebrate, joy
  • RS. related to the heart 心 of a prancing 夊 deer 鹿: joy
  • ⓢ big 大 joyous party celebrated in a spacious house 广

(Simplified: 庆)
Ideographic: To go to 夂 a celebration 心 in a house 广

heisig_chinese_memo: Poor Ned is feeling worried so Uncle Jimbo suggests a good deer huntin' trip to fix that and turn that melancholy into celebrateion.
heisig_constituent: jubilation, deer, cave, antlers, crown, heart, walking legs
heisig_story: Deer . . . crown (note the doubling up) . . . heart . . . walking legs. You may recall that we met the relative primitives at the bottom here before, in the kanji for melancholy (Frame 663).
koohiiStory1: The hunter experienced jubilation when the deer with melancholy walked up to him and said, "just shoot me, whats the point in running. Everyone dies someday..."
koohiiStory2: Bambi was melancholy at the death of his mother, but is now in jubilation as he´s made friends with thumper.
jp_example_words:
慶び(よろこび): joy, delight, rapture, pleasure, gratification, rejoicing, congratulations, felicitations
慶ぶ(よろこぶ): be delighted, be glad
WaniKani_Radicals: 广, 覀, 亅, 心, 夂
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If a pilot manages to land under a canopy with a helicopter that's pierced with a sideways barb in the heart of winter you should congratulate them! People should always be congratulated for doing good things, and this is one of the best things you've ever heard of!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Can you imagine how hard landing a helicopter in just one of these horrible conditions? Congratulate them!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Congratulate the pilot with cake (けい)!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Cake is always the appropriate celebratory food.
Ru_Radicals: 冖 (ва), 夂 (зима), 广 (скала с точкой), 心 (сердце)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the western (覀) stony cliff (广) goes (夂) to the covered (冖) heart (心) in jubilation
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Smart dogs in the future celebrate their birthdays in caves because all the drunken barking can get super loud.
humanum_full_description_en:
Jia Jinwen from "廌" from " heart ". Bronze inscriptions may not be from the " heart " but from the " wen ", like the beautiful patterns on the body of a beast, which extends the meaning of beauty, goodness, and good fortune. Xiaozhuan’s transformation from " deer " to " heart ", " deer " is an alteration of "廌", and its tail is corrupted to "夂". The ancients used deer skins as gifts in auspicious ceremonies to express their beautiful wishes. Therefore, It has the meaning of celebration and joy. "Said Wen": "Celebrate, go to congratulate people. From the heart to the kuai, the auspicious ceremony uses the deer skin as the body, so from the deer province."

Oracle is used as place name, "Collection" 24474: "Cai (in) celebration".

Jin Wen expresses Fuqing and Jiqing, and Caihou Shenzhong: "A state will be a state of prosperity, and there will be prosperity after a break." It means stability and harmony with many countries, and it is called beauty and merit. Also used as a name.

The bamboo slips of the Warring States period express joy, "Guodian Jane. "Bao Yi" Jane 13: "One person celebrates again, and all people rely on it." It means that one king has virtue, and thousands of people will benefit from him (Liu Zhao). "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. "Japanese Book A Type" Jian 42zheng: "First humiliate and then celebrate." "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. Japanese Book No. 1 Jan. 60: "Insult first and celebrate later." Also known as " Qing ", Jian 62 of "The Bamboo Slips from the Tomb of Marquis Yi Zeng": "Qing (Qing) Shi (Shi)", "Qing Shi" was responsible for managing the political affairs of the dynasty, and later referred to officials in general. "New Cai Chu Bamboo Slips" A Three Slips 65: "Xie has become a celebration."
humanum_short_description_en: Jia Jinwen from "廌" from " heart ". Bronze inscriptions may be from "廌" from " wen ", "廌" is a beast, and " wen " and " heart " are like patterns on the body of a beast. The beauty and joy are derived from the beautiful pattern (Wei Yihui).
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「廌」從「心」。金文或不從「心」而從「文」，象神獸身上漂亮的花紋，因而引申出美善、福、吉祥之義。小篆從「鹿」從「心」，「鹿」是「廌」的訛變，廌的尾巴訛變為「夂」，古人在吉祥的典禮中用鹿皮作為禮物，以表達美好的心願，因此有慶賀、喜慶之義。《說文》：「慶，行賀人也。从心从夊，吉禮以鹿皮爲贄，故从鹿省。」

　　甲骨文用作地名，《合集》24474：「才(在)慶」。

　　金文表示福慶、吉慶，蔡侯申鐘：「定均庶邦，休有成慶。」意謂安定協和眾多國家，稱美功績和福德。又用作人名。

　　戰國竹簡表示喜慶，《郭店簡．緇衣》簡13：「一人又(有)慶，萬民賴之。」意謂君王一人有美德，千千萬萬的民眾都會因他而受益(劉釗)。《睡虎地秦簡．日書甲種》簡42正：「先辱而後又(有)慶。」《睡虎地秦簡．日書乙種》簡60：「先辱後慶」。又通假為「卿」，《曾侯乙墓竹簡》簡62：「慶(卿)事(士)」，「卿士」負責管理王朝的政事，後泛指官吏。《新蔡楚簡》甲三簡65：「休有成慶」。
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「廌」從「心」。金文或從「廌」從「文」，「廌」是神獸，「文」、「心」象神獸身上的花紋，本義是廌身的花紋。由美麗的花紋引申出美善、喜慶之義(魏宜輝)。

甲金文從「 廌 」從「 心 」。金文或不從「 心 」而從「 文 」，象神獸身上漂亮的花紋，因而引申出美善、福、吉祥之義。小篆從「 鹿 」從「 心 」，「 鹿 」是「 廌 」的訛變，廌的尾巴訛變為「 夂 」，古人在吉祥的典禮中用鹿皮作為禮物，以表達美好的心願，因此有慶賀、喜慶之義。《說文》：「慶，行賀人也。从心从夊，吉禮以鹿皮爲贄，故从鹿省。」 甲骨文用作地名，《合集》24474：「才(在)慶」。 金文表示福慶、吉慶，蔡侯申鐘：「定均庶邦，休有成慶。」意謂安定協和眾多國家，稱美功績和福德。又用作人名。 戰國竹簡表示喜慶，《郭店簡．緇衣》簡13：「一人又(有)慶，萬民賴之。」意謂君王一人有美德，千千萬萬的民眾都會因他而受益(劉釗)。《睡虎地秦簡．日書甲種》簡42正：「先辱而後又(有)慶。」《睡虎地秦簡．日書乙種》簡60：「先辱後慶」。又通假為「 卿 」，《曾侯乙墓竹簡》簡62：「慶(卿)事(士)」，「卿士」負責管理王朝的政事，後泛指官吏。《新蔡楚簡》甲三簡65：「休有成慶」。
Jia Jinwen from " 廌" from " heart". Bronze inscriptions may not be from the " heart" but from the " wen", like the beautiful patterns on the body of a beast, which extends the meaning of beauty, goodness, and good fortune. Xiaozhuan’s transformation from " deer" to " heart", " deer" is an alteration of " 廌", and its tail is corrupted to " 夂". The ancients used deer skins as gifts in auspicious ceremonies to express their beautiful wishes. Therefore, It has the meaning of celebration and joy. "Said Wen": "Celebrate, go to congratulate people. From the heart to the kuai, the auspicious ceremony uses the deer skin as the body, so from the deer province." Oracle is used as place name, "Collection" 24474: "Cai (in) celebration". Jin Wen expresses Fuqing and Jiqing, and Caihou Shenzhong: "A state will be a state of prosperity, and there will be prosperity after a break." It means stability and harmony with many countries, and it is called beauty and merit. Also used as a name. The bamboo slips of the Warring States period express joy, "Guodian Jane. "Bao Yi" Jane 13: "One person celebrates again, and all people rely on it." It means that one king has virtue, and thousands of people will benefit from him (Liu Zhao). "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. "Japanese Book A Type" Jian 42zheng: "First humiliate and then celebrate." "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. Japanese Book No. 1 Jan. 60: "Insult first and celebrate later." Also known as " Qing", Jian 62 of "The Bamboo Slips from the Tomb of Marquis Yi Zeng": "Qing (Qing) Shi (Shi)", "Qing Shi" was responsible for managing the political affairs of the dynasty, and later referred to officials in general. 慶字的基本解释

慶
qìng
见“庆”。

慶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qìng］
［《廣韻》丘敬切，去映，溪。］
“庆1”的繁体字。
(1)祝贺；庆贺。
(2)引申为庆幸。
(3)善，善事。
(4)赏赐，褒美。
(5)引申为恩遇。
(6)福泽。
(7)引申为祥瑞。
(8)姓。春秋齐有庆封。见《左传·襄公二十八年》。
[②]［qiāng］
［《集韻》墟羊切，平陽，溪。］
发语词。
[③]［qīng］
［《集韻》丘京切，平庚，溪。］
通“卿1”。

慶字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　慶； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页400第13
〔古文〕??【唐韻】丘竟切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】丘正切，?卿去聲。【說文】行賀人也。【周禮·春官·宗伯】以賀慶之禮，親異姓之國。【疏】謂侯國有喜可賀，王使大夫以物慶賀之也。又【秋官·大行人】賀慶以贊諸侯之喜是也。　又善也。【書·呂?】一人有慶。【正義】天子有善事也。【詩·大雅】則篤其慶。【毛傳】善也。【正義】福慶爲善事，故爲善也。　又休也。【禮·月令】行慶施惠。【註】慶謂休其善也。休，美也。　又福也。【易·履卦】大有慶也。【詩·小雅】孝孫有慶。　又賜也。【詩·小雅】是以有慶矣。【箋】謂有慶賜之榮也。　又發語詞。【揚雄·反離騷】慶天悴而喪榮。　又州名。隋立慶州。　又姓。【左傳】齊慶封，晉慶鄭。　又【集韻】【韻會】?丘京切，音卿。【易·大畜五上兩爻傳】有慶也，道大行也。慶與行叶。又【睽卦四五兩爻傳】志行也，往有慶也。行與慶叶。【班固·白雉詩】容潔朗兮於淳精，發皓羽兮奮翹英。彰皇德兮侔周成，永延長兮膺天慶。慶與精英成叶，皆庚韻也。蓋慶乃卿字去聲，轉平

慶字的源字形

甲骨文金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

慶字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qìng］
["Guangyun" Qiu Jingqie, go to film, Xi. ]
Traditional characters for "庆1".
(1) Congratulations; congratulations.
(2) The extension is fortunate.
(3) Goodness, good deeds.
(4) Rewards and praise.
(5) The extension is grace.
(6) Fuze.
(7) The extension is auspicious.
(8) Last name. The Spring and Autumn Period has Qingfeng. See "Twenty-eight Years of Zuo Zhuan·Xiang Gong".
[②]［qiāng］
["Ji Yun" Xiu Sheep Cut, Pingyang, Xi. ]
Spoken words.
[③] [qīng]
["Ji Yun" Qiu Jingqie, Ping Geng, Xi. ]
Same as "Qing 1".

Celebrate
Name meaning

qìng
вм. 庆
Radicals: 广, 覀, 亅, 心, 夂  (canopy, helicopter, barb, heart, winter)
Meaning Mnemonic
If a pilot manages to land under a canopy with a helicopter that's pierced with a sideways barb in the heart of winter you should congratulate them! People should always be congratulated for doing good things, and this is one of the best things you've ever heard of!
Can you imagine how hard landing a helicopter in just one of these horrible conditions? Congratulate them!
Reading Mnemonic
Congratulate the pilot with cake (けい)!
Cake is always the appropriate celebratory food.

冖 (ва), 夂 (зима), 广 (скала с точкой), 心 (сердце)
